divs: Sighting Detailsstanding outside it was flying from SE to NW, got over the top of my house , my Sons camera flashed and the orange glowing , triangle shaped object went straight up and gone very quickly. there were Three of us watching, also there was no sound to this event.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in St. Petersburg
There were no other sightings in St. Petersburg on or around January 13th 2013
Summary: coming from SE towards NW, got over the top of house went straight up and went out of sight
